translation.title_en: Supiki Bot Update: Codex Support Added
translation.content_en:
This update introduces Codex support for Supiki Bot, which was previously only compatible with Claude Code. It is now available to all users with a ChatGPT Plus subscription or higher.

Download:
https://github.com/sorryhyun/claudeexe/releases/tag/alpha5

Release final alpha Â· sorryhyun/claudeexe
Now we support codex!
Download codex windows binary here, login by running it, and run supiki.

Note that you should run mascot-mcp.exe before running supiki app since Smartscreen blocks it...
github.com

Instructions:
1. Download the attached .exe file.
2. Follow the link to download the Windows Codex binary.
3. Open a terminal and run `./codex-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.exe login` to log in to Codex.
4. Run `mascot-mcp.exe` first to bypass Windows SmartScreen issues, then launch `supiki.exe`.

Codex offers more robust functionality than expected, which led to this integration. I am also planning to update my previously released RP platform to support Codex in the near future, so please stay tuned.

structured.content_en:
You can now enjoy terminal coding without Claude. Any ChatGPT Plus user can utilize this new tool, as the AI directly executes commands within the local environment.

## What Happened
The developer tool 'supiki' has begun supporting OpenAI Codex. Previously, this feature was only available within the Claude code environment. Now, ChatGPT Plus users also have local execution privileges. Users can install the latest alpha version currently being distributed on GitHub.

## Why It Matters
Dependency on specific AI models is reduced. Users can now assign tasks to their preferred AI. Furthermore, the scope of automation tools is expanding to include general users.

## Background
Claude previously dominated the market for terminal-based AI tools. OpenAI users have been waiting for a tool with comparable performance. Developer 'sorryhyun' bridged this gap by integrating Codex. Optimized executable files are provided for Windows environments.

## What's Next
More open-source projects will adopt Codex. Developers will soon be able to utilize RP platforms via Codex as well. Local AI control technology is entering the stage of widespread adoption.

## FAQ
**Q: Is a paid ChatGPT subscription mandatory?**
A: Yes. An account with a Plus subscription or higher is required for it to function.

**Q: Is the installation process complicated?**
A: No. Simply download the binary and log in through the terminal to complete the setup.

**Q: A security warning appears; is it safe?**
A: You can avoid the warning by running the included mascot-mcp.exe first.

structured.description_en: Break free from Claude. Discover how ChatGPT Plus users can now automate local terminal coding using the new supiki tool.
